description: This notification will be generated when the IP address of interface
is changed. The change maybe originate from NMS, DHCP server or
This notification announces useful IP address change. So it
is triggered by significative IP address change.

event.Summary: IP address of interface changed to $v3

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD A3COM-HUAWEI-IP-ADDRESS-MIB::h3cIpAddressChangeNotify A3COM-HUAWEI-IP-ADDRESS-MIB::h3cIpAddrNotifyIfIndex i 9999 A3COM-HUAWEI-IP-ADDRESS-MIB::h3cIpAddrOldIpAddress s EXAMPLE A3COM-HUAWEI-IP-ADDRESS-MIB::h3cIpAddrNewIpAddress s EXAMPLE A3COM-HUAWEI-IP-ADDRESS-MIB::h3cIpAddrFirstTrapTime t 31536000

description: The IP address IfIndex of specified interface on the device.
variables.name: A3COM-HUAWEI-IP-ADDRESS-MIB::h3cIpAddrNotifyIfIndex

description: The Old IP address of specified interface on the device.
variables.name: A3COM-HUAWEI-IP-ADDRESS-MIB::h3cIpAddrOldIpAddress

description: The New IP address of specified interface on the device.
variables.name: A3COM-HUAWEI-IP-ADDRESS-MIB::h3cIpAddrNewIpAddress
